content: a sweet summer hat to spice up your wardrobe this flirty little number is crocheted out of your favorite worsted weight yarn and features a charming pair of cherries and a dainty scalloped edge pattern specifics finished size 21 in circumference and 8 deep yarn approximately 4 oz of your favorite worsted weight yarn a small amount of both green and red for the cherries and leaves hook size 4 mm 3 mm notions darning needle for sewing in ends skill level intermediate pattern notes join rounds with a slip_stitch to the top of the beginning st of round unless otherwise noted chain 3 counts as first double_crochet or the round
